module.name: bookmarks2/bookmarks2
module.description: Displays an interactive list of items and/or links. You can add/edit/delete items. Whenever an option is selected the event bookmakrs.onClick is raised.

attribute.description: [Optional] Indicates the URL of a document where to store the bookmark entries. Leave empty to use default storage.
attribute.name: url

attribute.description: Must be either Yes or No. Indicates whether to go to the URL address in the bookmark when clicking on it
attribute.name: followLink

method.description: Display a dialog box to create a new item
method.name: getAddItem

method.description: Adds an item to the list
method.name: addItem

method.description: Adds an item to the list (alternate format)
method.name: addItem2

method.description: Opens an XML editor to modify the bookmarks manually
method.name: getEdit

event.description: This event is raised when someone clicks on a bookmark
event.name: onClick
